name: canshare-who-haematology-mzl-histology
title: NZ WHO haematolymphoid marginal zone lymphoma histology
description: Histologies used for marginal zone lymphoma (WHO Classification of Tumours, Haematolymphoid Tumours) or an 'Other' value.

contains.display: Extranodal marginal zone B-cell lymphoma of mucosa-associated lymphoid tissue
Heavy chain class switched form immunoglobulin A or immunoglobulin G or immunoglobulin E positive primary cutaneous marginal zone lymphoma

Primary cutaneous marginal zone B-cell lymphoma
Primary cutaneous marginal zone lymphoma without defining characteristics
